# Introduction

The aim of this guide to provide a guide for RAP at the ONS. This is meant to be a more comprehsive guide for RAP at the ONS aimed at those newer to coding and is a suppliment to the [RAP Companion](https://ukgovdatascience.github.io/rap_companion/) and [RAP course on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/reproducible-analytical-pipelines/?src=sac&kw=reprod). These materials are excellent and provide an in-depth look at RAP in R.
